Read the number of blinks of the ABS warning light.

item.ptxt: As an example, the blinking patterns for DTCs 72 and 76 are shown below.
The conditions are explained in the Diagnostic Trouble Code Chart.
For the normal code, the light cycles between ON and OFF at intervals of 0.25 seconds.
If more than 1 DTC is detected at the same time, the codes will be displayed in numerical order.

step2.ptxt: After the check, disconnect SST from terminals 13 (TC) and 4 (CG) of the DLC3.

Start the engine.
